remarks: A sufficient condition for a function to be continuous.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2014.)
statement:
cn1lem.1 $e |- F : CC --> CC $.
cn1lem.2 $e |- ( ( z e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` z ) - ( F ` A ) ) ) <_ ( abs ` ( z - A ) ) ) $.
cn1lem $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ x e. RR+ ) -> E. y e. RR+ A. z e. CC ( ( abs ` ( z - A ) ) < y -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` z ) - ( F ` A ) ) ) < x ) ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d F y $.
$d x y z $.
